item.description:
Narrows Festival of the Arts
Join us for the 11th Annual Narrows Festival of the Arts, a day of Fine Music, Fine Art and Fine Food located on the historic waterfront area of Fall River. The Festival features over 30 fine artisan vendors, a children's area led by the Children's Museum of Greater Fall River, a food court and fantastic live music. This year headlining performers on the outdoor stage include Duke Robillard and Garland Jeffreys as well as Dana Fuchs and Lake Street Dive. Indoors, performers include The Revelations, Mark Cutler, Bob Kendall and Dino Govini-Doug Olsen Quintet.

This was a terrific event last year!

Entry is FREE!!

Food and beer vendors available.

http://www.narrowscenter.org/?page_id=18
item.name: Narrows Festival of the Arts
